meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a particular season.
meanings.sent1: The store displayed its seasonals decorations for the upcoming holiday.
meanings.sent2: I love wearing seasonals colors like red and green during Christmas.
meanings.sent3: The snowman looked quite dapper in his seasonals scarf and hat.
meanings.sent4: The trees transformed into a beautiful array of seasonals hues in the autumn.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pumpkin spice in the air was a sure sign of the seasonals change.

meanings.sent1: During the summer, the farm hires many seasonals to help with the harvest.
meanings.sent2: The resort always brings in extra seasonals staff for the busy tourist season.
meanings.sent3: The seasonals were excited to start their new job at the amusement park.
meanings.sent4: As a seasonals, she enjoyed the flexibility of working different jobs throughout the year.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant manager hired several seasonals to cover for staff on vacation.

meanings.sent1: The bakery's pumpkin pie was a popular seasonals treat in the fall.
meanings.sent2: The store stocked up on seasonals like swimsuits and sunscreen for summer.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a line of seasonals clothing for the spring collection.
meanings.sent4: The grocery store offered a variety of seasonals fruits and vegetables in the produce section.
